trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_SEQ_00<tab>Lumull is vibrating with nervous energy.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Eyaney.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Eyaney again.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_02<tab>Survey the vantage point.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_03<tab>Survey the next vantage point.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_04<tab>Survey the next vantage point.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_05<tab>Use the synthetic desensitizer on the lightning sprites.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Eyaney.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_001<tab>One wonders how fearsome this Eyaney truly is...
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_GRAHATIA_000_002<tab>If Treno's barrier is similar in design to Alexandria's, should we assume that electrope technology is standard here as well?
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_LUMULL_000_011<tab>At the moment, Eyaney should be waiting just past that park.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_LUMULL_000_012<tab>Let's be off before anyone changes their mind!
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_021<tab>Lumull is sweating rather profusely...

TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_GRAHATIA_000_022<tab>Whenever we meet an engineer from some distant land, I can't help but wish to introduce them to our friends at the Ironworks. Such a firestorm of questions there would be...
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_LUMULL_000_023<tab>(Breathe in... Breathe out...)
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_031<tab>They put one in mind of another pair of siblings we know, don't they?
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_041<tab><gasp> I entirely forgot to ask your names! Do forgive me.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_042<tab>I am Krile, and this is <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_043<tab>Accompanying Lumull is G'raha Tia, our own technology enthusiast.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_044<tab>It's lovely to meet you!
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_045<tab>It feels strange putting you to work, but I'd be lying if I said I don't need the help.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_046<tab>In the wake of an event like this, I presume a great deal of labor is required to restore everything to working order...

TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_047<tab>The volume of fixes that need making is one matter, but I could handle it if it weren't for these legs of mine. The paralysis flares up at the worst times, I swear...
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_048<tab>I can manage a bit of shuffling from one station to the other on a good day, but I usually leave racing around the city to my brother.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_049<tab>With him off to the mine, though, someone else needs to take care of the lightning sprites. They're drawn to the discharged aether of slain creatures.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_050<tab>I'd offer you the detector to make tracking them down easier, but seeing as Lumull has managed to break it yet again... <sigh>

TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_051<tab>I do have this, though. Toss some at a sprite, and you can suppress its ability to sense aether nearby. That usually gets them wandering out of the city towards more fertile ground.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_052<tab>So we needn't fight them?

TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_053<tab>We find it's safer not to. When threatened, they'll siphon energy from facilities we need to keep our medical services running, or emit bursts that overload nearby systems.

TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_054<tab>For the same reason, I recommend you stick to thoroughfares that will allow you to spot them well in advance. I would hate for you to be injured while helping us.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_055<tab>Understood.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_KRILE_000_056<tab>We'll want to split up again to cover more ground. Are you ready to go?
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_061<tab>I appreciate the help. I'll be here working on the detector while you're away.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_SYSTEM_100_065<tab>Though you scan the area thoroughly, you see no lightning sprites.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_SYSTEM_100_066<tab>Though you scan the area thoroughly, you see no lightning sprites.
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_SYSTEM_100_067<tab>Lightning sprites! The time to test your tossing arm has arrived...
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_RESIDENT05431_100_071<tab>Guests are always welcome in Treno. I hope you're enjoying your time here!
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_081<tab>You're back! Were there many sprites?
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_082<tab>Just a handful on your route, then? Could be worse!
TEXT_KINGMJ105_05430_EYANEY_000_084<tab>Still, it's important to keep the city free of them. We're much obliged!
